column4: `Allegro: GNOME3 doesn't work at all from what I've seen and heard.
FUD.  Gnome3 does have some rough spots, but it's pretty good.
When I installed it from a PPA it destroyed Unity and failed, it went to a very basic layout. I had to use ppa-purge to get back to a working environment.
Probably because Ubuntu doesn't like gnome-shell
